page.title: 17GATTEN&LAKE PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: This{primary school was built in 1883 it is part of the{first tier}in the Island's three tier system of education. Children enter the term before their 5th birthday and leave in the July that they are 9.There are six classes and there are normally 186 children in the school.At the end of the year the children publish a school magazine.Before the magazine is published there is a school camp at Totland Bay Youth Hostel and a series of walks.The school is quite big and there is a swimming pool on the premises.There are 7 teachers and a headmaster called Mr.H.Brown.School starts at 9:05 and finishes at 3:20.There is a small playground and the big playground has a small football pitch.The school field is on the other side of the railway line.
